entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:27 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning early in the evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or snow. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
